item.description:
Miss having the time to work on projects you put aside because life got in the way?  Ready to make time for yourself?  Want to chat while you knit?  Share tips and ideas?  Just relax and have fun?

 

Bring your project and come join us at Ladies Knit Nite!

 

Brought together by an empty nester/novice knitter and a wonderful expert with 40+ years experience in the knitting and yarn industry.

 

Conveniently located on the Burlington/Woburn line we meet weekly on... Wednesday!  Because we meet in a private residence there is plenty of room and no outside noise to keep us from chatting!

 

We look forward to having you join us for a relaxing evening of knitting (or crocheting) and conversation.

 

Not everyone who attends the group is on meetup so even if it looks like not very many knitters will be in attendance there is always at least 3 or 4 of us here each week.
item.name: Ladies' Knit Nite
